definition: life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: The Vice President orders them to find the leak.
sentences.chinese: 副總統命令他們找出這個泄密的人。

sentences.english: Soon, Naaman drove his chariot to the Jordan and followed my command of dipping in the water seven times.
sentences.chinese: 我命令他“在約旦河沐浴七次”。

sentences.english: He ordered the land to be dug and trenched.
sentences.chinese: 他命令在這片土地上挖洞並挖好戰壕。

sentences.english: It should run successfully this time.
The division headquarters was ordered to issue the evacuation was ordered.
sentences.chinese: 師部奉命下達大撤退的命令。

sentences.english: Who can give a help about commands for SECATT?
sentences.chinese: 誰能共享一下紅框中命令的幫助啊。

sentences.english: Figure 3. A sample customized menu of favorite commands.
sentences.chinese: 圖形⒊一個定製喜愛命令的菜單樣品。

sentences.english: Word-processor like formatting commands that apply to text and equations.
sentences.chinese: 類似字處理器的格式化命令適用於文本和方程。

sentences.english: This means no more re-typing the password as you would normally do on the command line.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着不需要像平時一樣在命令行上重複輸入密碼。

sentences.english: He ordered Terni to go get his only son, Arius.
sentences.chinese: 瑪德尼命令特尼找到他那唯一的兒子艾利烏。

sentences.english: CQS puts commands and queries in different methods within a type.
sentences.chinese: CQS將命令和查詢作爲不同的方法放在一個類中。

sentences.english: By the orders of the deputy procureur?
sentences.chinese: 是奉了代理檢察官的命令嗎？

sentences.english: We may not be able to move mountains with our minds, but robots will await our mental commands.
sentences.chinese: 我們的思想無法移山，但可以命令機器人。

sentences.english: We are commanded in Scripture to resist him, staying strong in our faith.
sentences.chinese: 我們在聖經中被命令要抵擋他，在信上堅強。

sentences.english: This command launches the daemon each time the machine restarts.
sentences.chinese: 這個命令在機器每次啓動時啓動守護進程。

sentences.english: He was confident on their own can also win city huoshan, then ordered the attack.
sentences.chinese: 他自信靠自己的力量也能拿下霍山城，於是命令進攻。

definition: to transmit down (a chain of command)/to pass down (to lower level)/to issue/to send through
against orders/to disobey/to refuse to accept orders
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
an order (esp. army)/bugle call expressing military order/verbal command
military orders are like mountains (idiom)/a military order must be obeyed
